li.label: slowpoke
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.

li.label: fast walker
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.

li.label: jogger
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

li.label: chemical fascination
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. [PAWN_pronoun] will consume much more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on hard drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.

li.label: chemical interest
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. [PAWN_pronoun] will consume more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on social drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.

li.label: teetotaler
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs.

li.label: sanguine
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

li.label: optimist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.

li.label: pessimist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to look on the bad side of life.

li.label: depressive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

li.label: iron-willed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

li.label: steadfast
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

li.label: nervous
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to crack under pressure.

li.label: volatile
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.

li.label: neurotic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].

li.label: very neurotic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].

li.label: industrious
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

li.label: hard worker
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

li.label: lazy
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a little bit lazy.

li.label: slothful
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

li.label: psychically hypersensitive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically sensitive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically dull
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically deaf
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

li.label: careful shooter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

li.label: trigger-happy
li.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_nameDef] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

li.label: beautiful
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

li.label: pretty
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].

li.label: ugly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

li.label: staggeringly ugly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.

li.label: super-immune
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

li.label: sickly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
